ygData.messageBody:
Hail all,

I second the motion on this letter and support it wholeheartedly. I don't think we have a snowballs chance in hell on some of this stuff, but I agree with the "accountant". You have to give them something to say no to. My 2 favorite suggestions are increasing the med skill cap (this would be a HUGE help) and the line of sight shadowstep. Specialization is just as important, but this should be in the game already damnit.

Here's an idea I've been kicking around with my friends lately, what about a "Lay Mana" skill where we can fully or partially regen all of our mana once per day like the paladins can? This would go a long way to making soloing a more viable alternative for wizards (I enjoy both soloing and grouping). My friends have suggested that this would break wizards, especially during group play, so perhaps it wouldn't be able to be used if your grouped? just a thought.

ADD MY NAME TO THAT LETTER

Maureen, Lvl 18 SuperWizz, Povar
